description:
A spare cylinder for the BCA Float 2.0 Airbag System.

  • Compact size and light weight make it easy to carry
  • When deployed the cylinder activates a release of 3,000 psi of compressed air
  • Has attached pressure regulator and connectors for Float 2.0 Systems
  • Sold as a full cylinder. Empty cylinders can be filled at BCA authorized depots
  • Compatible with BCA Float 2.0 Airbag systems only. Not compatible with BCA Float 1.0 Airbag systems
name: Backcountry Access Float 2.0 Cylinder (Full)
